title: Crafting system
body:
Hello fellow players,
I'll keep it short and simple. When is the Crafting system going live? It would be great if we were to have some more information on it. It looks like a great system with a lot of fun. 
Thanks for your time.
-Finn

replies.body:
It's only been on the PBE (Beta Environment) for a couple of weeks now, along with the coming 6.2 patch changes. Big systems like this usually take a little longer to work out all the kinks on before release though. So at the very earliest it'll be out when 6.2 goes live in a week or two, but I think it's more likely going to hit with 6.3 after that. 

Just an educated guess though.
